title: Aged Gouda Holland
description: Premium Dutch Gouda aged for 18 months. Sweet, caramelized flavor with crunchy calcium lactate crystals.

title: Aged Parmesan Cheese
description: Authentic Parmigiano-Reggiano, aged for 24 months for a sharp, nutty flavor.

title: Almond Biscotti
description: Traditional Italian almond biscotti, perfect for dipping in coffee or wine. Crunchy and flavorful.

title: Amarone della Valpolicella DOCG
description: Rich, full-bodied red wine from Veneto. Notes of dried fruit, chocolate, and spices. Pairs well with game meats.

title: Arborio Rice Superfino
description: Premium Italian short-grain rice perfect for risotto. High starch content creates the ideal creamy consistency.

title: Artisanal Pasta - Fusilli
description: Handcrafted Fusilli pasta, perfect for catching your favorite sauces. Made with 100% durum wheat.

title: Barolo DOCG 2018
description: Noble Nebbiolo wine from Piedmont. Full-bodied with complex tannins, notes of cherry, rose, and tar. Perfect with red meat.

title: Brie de Meaux AOC
description: The king of cheeses. Soft, creamy French Brie with a bloomy white rind and rich, buttery interior.

title: Champagne Vintage Dom Pérignon
description: Prestigious French champagne with fine bubbles. Complex aromas of white fruits, brioche, and mineral notes.

title: Chianti Classico Riserva DOCG
description: Traditional Tuscan wine made from Sangiovese grapes. Elegant with cherry flavors, balanced acidity, and smooth tannins.

title: Gourmet Coffee Beans
description: A medium roast blend of Arabica beans from South America, with notes of chocolate and caramel.

title: Orecchiette Pugliesi
description: Traditional ear-shaped pasta from Puglia. Hand-rolled using durum wheat semolina for authentic texture and flavor.

title: Paccheri Artisanal Pasta
description: Large tube pasta perfect for hearty sauces. Bronze-die extruded for perfect sauce adhesion and al dente texture.

title: Parmigiano-Reggiano DOP 24 Months
description: Authentic Italian Parmigiano-Reggiano aged for 24 months. Hard, granular texture with a rich, nutty flavor and crystalline crunch.

title: Premium Olive Oil
description: Extra virgin olive oil from the hills of Tuscany. Cold-pressed and unfiltered for maximum flavor.

title: Prosciutto di Parma DOP
description: Italian dry-cured ham aged for 18 months. Delicate, sweet flavor with a silky texture that melts on the tongue.

title: Roquefort AOP Blue Cheese
description: Traditional French blue cheese made from sheep's milk. Creamy texture with a sharp, tangy flavor and distinctive blue veining.

title: Spanish Jamón Ibérico Bellota
description: Premium acorn-fed Iberian ham from Spain. Complex nutty flavor with marbled fat that creates an exceptional taste experience.

title: Tagliatelle all'Uovo
description: Fresh egg pasta ribbons from Emilia-Romagna. Made with semolina flour and farm-fresh eggs for authentic Italian taste.

title: Tipo 00 Flour Caputo
description: Finely milled Italian flour perfect for pizza and bread making. Soft texture with excellent gluten development.
